meta.title: Aztec | Co-Founder, LitVM (Litecoin Layer 2)
meta.description: Explore how Aztec and LitVM bring Litecoin trustlessly into Web3 with a hybrid Layer 2 that unites Bitcoin, Ethereum, and ZK innovation.

hero.name: Aztec
hero.title: Co-Founder, LitVM | Litecoin Layer 2
hero.tagline: Assembling the blockchain Avengers to make trustless Litecoin interoperability a reality.

about.summary: Aztec unites cypherpunks, regulators, and investors to deliver LitVM—the first Litecoin Layer 2 endorsed by the Litecoin Foundation and Charlie Lee.

origin_story.headline: From incubation to innovation.
origin_story.copy: After launching and incubating projects like Polygon and QuickSwap with Lunar Digital Assets, Aztec turned to Litecoin’s untapped potential.

inflection_point.headline: Thrown into the BitAngels ecosystem.
inflection_point.copy: Supporting Eric and Richard at BitAngels, Aztec saw Arizona’s hunger for freedom technologies and rallied builders to form a super team.

mission.headline: Deliver freedom technologies that protect rights while unlocking interoperability across blockchain camps.

pillars.title: Trustless Interop
pillars.description: Bridge Litecoin into Web3 without centralized intermediaries using ZK proofs.

pillars.title: Collaborative Builders
pillars.description: Rally Bitcoin pioneers, Ethereum innovators, and Zcash technologists to work as one.

pillars.title: Freedom First
pillars.description: Empower communities to defend privacy and decentralization against technocratic control.

project.name: LitVM (Litecoin Layer 2)
project.problem: Litecoin lacked a fully trustless, decentralized bridge into Web3, limiting institutions and developers seeking interoperable strategies.
project.solution: LitVM delivers a hybrid Layer 2 leveraging BitcoinOS, Ethereum, and Zcash expertise to roll up to both Ethereum and Litecoin, enabling trustless interoperability with ZK proofs.
value_proposition: Bring Litecoin into Web3 with trustless, decentralized infrastructure.
Unlock strategies for institutions, digital asset treasuries, and funds.
Catalyze cross-chain collaboration between sound money advocates and Web3 builders.

experience.headline: Welcome to LitVM, the silver standard for Litecoin interoperability.
copy: Dive into the 18-page Silver Standard research paper outlining the opportunity for Litecoin Layer 2.
See how AI-augmented teams, infrastructure sandboxes, and regulatory alignment create fertile ground in Arizona.
Join pioneers rallying misfits, regulators, and technologists to build freedom technologies together.

features: Hybrid rollup touching Ethereum and Litecoin
Partnership with BitcoinOS and cross-chain core teams
Institution-ready infrastructure for treasuries and funds

traction.endorsements: Fully endorsed by the Litecoin Foundation and Charlie Lee.
traction.ecosystem_momentum: Guided by Lunar Digital Assets with experience launching Polygon, QuickSwap, and other flagship protocols.

call_to_action.headline: Ready to build on the Litecoin Layer 2 frontier?

highlights: Arizona is attracting chips, regulators, and cypherpunk misfits eager to build freedom technologies.
LitVM aims to unite Bitcoin, Ethereum, Zcash, and Litecoin communities through ZK-based interoperability.
Aztec envisions AI-enhanced teams coordinating design, development, and distribution with regulatory maturity.
Believes the future hinges on defending privacy and decentralization against technocratic control.

quotes.speaker: Aztec
quotes.text: There’s a lot of money moving into Arizona—we have the chips coming in, great regulators, and a lot more blockchain cypherpunks.

quotes.speaker: Aztec
quotes.text: I was instrumental in launching and incubating projects like Polygon and QuickSwap; now I’m focused on LitVM, the first Litecoin layer two.

quotes.speaker: Aztec
quotes.text: We’re bringing Litecoin trustless into Web3 because there aren’t any fully trustless decentralized options today.

quotes.speaker: Aztec
quotes.text: Interoperability by way of ZK technology is going to bring everyone together.

quotes.speaker: Aztec
quotes.text: We can come together, build decentralized communities, protect privacy, and build freedom technologies.

quotes.speaker: Aztec
quotes.text: Start with our 18-page research paper—the Silver Standard—and see the opportunity Litecoin has.

timeline.event: Helped incubate Polygon, QuickSwap, Persistence, and other flagship protocols.
